resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
The holy Byble,
conteynyng the olde
Testament and the newe.
Set foorth by aucthoritie.
resource.chars:
The holy Byble,

conteynyng the olde

Testament and the newe.

Set foorth by aucthoritie.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text:
I am not ashamed of the Gospel of Christe, because it is the power of God unto salvation to all that beleve. 
Rom.i.
resource.chars:
I am not ashamed of the Gospel of Christe, because it is the power of God unto salvation to all that beleve. 

Rom.i.
